description: INTEGRATED SOCIO-ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT IN PANKISI VALLEY

subproject.description:
The initiation plan is prepared in order to finalize the process of Project Initiation for the Project “Integrated Socio-Economic Development in Pankisi Valley”which will aim to foster integrated local economic development to benefit primarily the most vulnerable population of Pankisi gorge. The main priority of the UNDP’s intervention is to establish a sustainable inclusive mechanism for local area economic development based on the cooperation among local population (especially among refugees and local residents), national and local authorities (MRA and Akhmeta municipality in the planning and implementation of economic and social activities.

The project will represent an innovated model for transition from humanitarian assistance to integrated local development. The lessons learnt from the project can be applied to the new thinking of managing similar processes which are now being considered nation-wide. The project will take a holistic approach to the integration needs of the refugee and the development of the Pankisi Valley using participatory methods to engage both communities (refugees and the local population) along with Government, Civil Society and Business stakeholders in the development planning process.
